meanings.definition: The quality of being aggressively masculine in behavior or attitude.
meanings.sent1: His machoism was evident in the way he always tried to prove his strength.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed a character with extreme machoism, always seeking physical challenges.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small stature, his machoism led him to attempt lifting heavy weights at the gym.
meanings.sent4: His machoism was like a shield, protecting him from showing any vulnerability.
meanings.sent5: The machoism of the wrestler was so intense that even his opponents admired his toughness.

meanings.definition: A strong or exaggerated sense of masculinity.
meanings.sent1: The machoism of the action hero made him a favorite among fans.
meanings.sent2: His machoism often made him overlook the feelings of others.
meanings.sent3: The machoism of the lumberjack was evident in his love for flannel shirts.
meanings.sent4: His machoism was like a mask, hiding his insecurities from the world.
meanings.sent5: The machoism of the cowboy was so ingrained that he never showed any emotion.
